Note: Participant is completely unclear what the camera is actually capturing and picked up phone to see the image they had taken before sending
Participant gained appreciation for the visual confirmation they had before sending images while using the MR glasses while the gen2 glasses feel less comfortable in this situation
Participant says it is clear when an image is captured through auditory confirmation
Participant took a look at images and videos they sent in WhatsApp and was not expecting the results
Images were more zoomed out and expansive than expected
Main subject appeared off centered when participant expected a more centered image
Participant feels that gen2 glasses are noticeably lighter than MR display glasses
Participant feels less physical pressure on nose bridge with Gen2 glasses
Participant often forgets they have to activate Meta with Hey Meta when asking follow-up questions
Participant’s text messages and responses appear earlier than “earlier” timestamped messages
Participant continues to lift glasses off of nose bridge and when I ask if the glasses are bothering them, the participant responds with “Yes, I want to take them off”
